ygData.subject: Re: LvL 20-24
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow. I never seem to have a problem. Although, I have to admit, I have made ALOT of friends around the server, and lotsa people send me tells looking for a
ygData.messageBody:
Wow.

I never seem to have a problem.
Although, I have to admit, I have made ALOT of friends around the server,
and lotsa people send me tells looking for a cleric when I get on.

I am currently lvl 23 and close to 24. I run around Unrest for the most
part, and advertise every once in awhile that I am looking to group. If I
don't have any contacts on, I usually spend about 5-10 minutes doing this
before I get a tell.

The other thing that I do when it is really slow (I did this last night). I
sat out on the lawn of unrest invised...and assisted a party when they got
mobbed. Lo and behold...I heal their tanks a few times, this pulls a dusty
werebat and a few carrion ghouls onto me..and I zip to zone. When I zone
back later on...I get a tell asking me to join their party. Not too shabby.

You can solo in unrest...not that hard, and at 20..their is still stuff that
gives you experience that is on floor one. I just reccomend being helpful
and people will remember and ask.

Regards,

Tkith Truefriend
23rd Circle Cleric
Quellious


>From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] LvL 20-24
>Date: Thu, 14 Oct 1999 15:24:43 -0700
>
>Hi all. I'd like to give props out to you all, and everyone on the
>eq-cleric forum at stratic. (if any of you do both of these)
>So far that forum and this list is easily, from what i've seen, most of
>the maturist ppl in this game..mind you, there are always exceptions.
>Well anyways, I've run into real life head on, and basically my playing
>time has become very short, to almost non existant.. :(
>I'm currently lvl 20, and am finding myself getting somewhat
>frustrated. I have a few wizards in the group of ppl that I play with
>(all higher lvl though) and I am able to occasinoally go to multiple
>zones. I'm having an extremely tough time finding a group. Now, I know
>my name has not been tarnished, unless it's been by an adolescent, so I
>rule that case out. My friends say this is a tough time for a cleric to
>find groups because our heal spell isn't that effective (which I
>agree). But, being the poor melee'ers we are, I can't solo (one
>exception..If I can do 2 things..1) find undead available to kill 2)
>root holds).
>I've been to unrest, lake rathe, oasis, bird citie (south karana? or
>north..can't remember), perma, and basically I never get tells back from
>anyone. Now one thing I've noticed is that the number of clerics has
>risen, and groups will often tell me, 'sorry, we already have a
>cleric'. And I'm not sure why they wouldn't want another one! Oh well,
>I throw that away assuming they are playing their first character.
>Anyways, I was basically just looking for a place to hunt and that I can
>easily get a group. It sucks when you might have 2 hours to play a
>week, and you spend 1 hour advertising for a group...
>Or is it possibly I'm going to have to do my best to find a place to
>solo undead for 4 levels?
>
>Any and all help would be appreciated.
>TIA
>
>Evertorn
>20th lvl erudite cleric
>Veeshan
>
><< text3.html >>
